title: Fps isn't stable
body:
Hey guys!
I just downloaded league of legends on a new pc with low specs (windows 10), everything is working, except the fps, it keeps going 100 fps to 30 fps, 70-20, and I tried many solutiong none of them worked, I made sure that my devices are up to date, still fps isn't stable.

replies.body: You may run into issues if your PC doesn't meat the [minimum specs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements).  Beyond that, try out the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your PC by updating your drivers, game files, or other potential culprits.  I hope that helps!
